Articles.Content:
Hello! I figured that I needed a counterpart to my MiG-21 craft, so here's the Phantom!

Specs:

**Max range @100% throttle @ ~100m alt**: 67km

**Max Speed**: 408m/s @ ~100m alt

**Launch weight**: 15.6 tons

**Crew**:2 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/LGh8i)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/z5j0z7vks0kyawm/Phantom.craft?dl=0)

**Modded version (uses** [**BDArmory**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoDs%20Armory) **and** [**BD Dynamics**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/101/Bahamuto_Dynamics_Parts_pack_v1.1)**)**

F-4 Phantom II

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7qexz14e3c1l6h4/Phantom%20%28BD%20A-A%29.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T06:14:41Z" title="08/28/2015 06:14  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by Yaeah**

I dig it dude. I've wanted to build one of these for a while. Sweet aircraft.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-07T02:40:16Z" title="08/07/2015 02:40  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 7, 2015</time> by clown\_baby**

> 
> I dig it dude. I've wanted to build one of these for a while. Sweet aircraft.

Thanks man, it's a lot coming from a designer like you, you make some excellent planes!
great aircraft and design! Could you provide us with the top speed & capability range?

> 
> great aircraft and design! Could you provide us with the top speed & capability range?

Post has been updated
